Glendale.Ocean Way Recording:
Ocean Way Recording was the name of a series of recording studios located in Los Angeles, California and Nashville, Tennessee. Originally known as a two-building complex in Hollywood called United Western Recorders, the United site was sold to Allen Sides, who renamed it to Ocean Way Recording in 1988.
In 1999, the building located at 6050 Sunset Boulevard was partitioned and sold as EastWest Studios.
